record_purpose: Summary and control totals for the purchase order transaction

record_type_identifier.description: Identifies this record as a summary-level record

record_layout_qualifier.description: Specifies summary layout for transaction totals

Total_Line_Item_Count.description: Total number of line items included in the purchase order

Total_Quantity.description: Total quantity across all line items in the purchase order
Total_Quantity.notes: Meaning depends on trading partner agreement; often sum of PO1 quantities

Total_Amount.description: Total monetary amount of the purchase order
Total_Amount.notes: Often derived by ERP as sum of line amounts; not always present in X12

Summary_Validation_Status.description: Indicates whether summary totals match calculated values
Summary_Validation_Status.notes: Used internally by ERP or validation engine

Org_ID.description: ERP operating unit or organization context

CONTROL1.description: Reserved summary control field for ERP or customer use

CONTROL2.description: Reserved summary control field for ERP or customer use

CONTROL3.description: Reserved summary control field for ERP or customer use
